overview:
Matthew (Matt) N. Madderra is the Chief Executive Officer of Exfront Technologies, a full service web and consulting provider for personal and small business technology solutions. Madderra founded Exfront in April of 2005 and has remained the company’s primary business manager as well as working a developer and lead consultant.

Together with the company’s business and technical leaders, Madderra is focused on the continued success and growth across Exfront’s two primary business segments. Exfront’s goal is to offer a complete technology portfolio of services and solutions, which provide the best value for its customers.

Madderra was born in November 1984, and grew up in a suburb of New Orleans. He graduated from Texas Christian University (TCU) with a Bachelor of Science in Computer Information Technology. While in college, Madderra was involved in student government, Upsilon Pi Epsilon, and numerous other organizations. He also developed and maintained web sites for several academic departments and on-campus organizations. Madderra founded Exfront near the end of his sophomore year, and operated the company out of his TCU residence hall in Fort Worth until graduating in 2007. The company’s operations are currently located in Dallas, TX.
